meta.description: BKAP VoiceHero – 15 scenes x 3 levels (Easy/Standard/Challenging). Mỗi lượt: short AI line + sample learner answer + target sound.

phonemeTips.label: /r/
phonemeTips.description: Curl your tongue slightly back, do not touch the roof of your mouth.
phonemeTips.hint_vi: Cong nhẹ lưỡi ra sau, không chạm vòm miệng.
phonemeTips.hint_en: Curl your tongue back a little, keep it off the roof of your mouth.

phonemeTips.label: /θ/
phonemeTips.description: Put your tongue between your teeth and blow air out gently.
phonemeTips.hint_vi: Đặt đầu lưỡi giữa hai hàm răng, thổi hơi nhẹ.
phonemeTips.hint_en: Place the tip of your tongue between your teeth and push air out.

phonemeTips.label: /ð/
phonemeTips.description: Same tongue position as /θ/, but make your voice vibrate.
phonemeTips.hint_vi: Vị trí giống /θ/ nhưng có rung dây thanh.
phonemeTips.hint_en: Same as /θ/ but let your voice vibrate.

phonemeTips.label: /v/ vs /w/
phonemeTips.description: /v/: teeth on lip + vibration; /w/: round lips, no teeth on lip.
phonemeTips.hint_vi: /v/ cắn nhẹ môi dưới; /w/ chu môi tròn, không chạm răng.
phonemeTips.hint_en: For /v/ bite your lower lip; for /w/ round your lips without teeth.

phonemeTips.label: /l/
phonemeTips.description: Touch the ridge behind your teeth with your tongue.
phonemeTips.hint_vi: Đầu lưỡi chạm nướu ngay sau răng cửa trên.
phonemeTips.hint_en: Touch the ridge behind your upper teeth with the tip of your tongue.

phonemeTips.label: ending /t/
phonemeTips.description: Stop the air shortly at the end, like a soft click.
phonemeTips.hint_vi: Ngắt hơi nhanh ở cuối, như tiếng 't' rất nhẹ.
phonemeTips.hint_en: Cut the air quickly at the end with a soft /t/ sound.

phonemeTips.label: ending /d/
phonemeTips.description: Soft /d/ at the end, tongue touches the ridge lightly.
phonemeTips.hint_vi: Kết thúc bằng /d/ nhẹ, đầu lưỡi chạm nướu.
phonemeTips.hint_en: End with a soft /d/ and touch the ridge behind your teeth.

phonemeTips.label: ending /s/ vs /z/
phonemeTips.description: Voiceless /s/ no vibration; voiced /z/ with vibration.
phonemeTips.hint_vi: /s/ không rung; /z/ có rung cổ.
phonemeTips.hint_en: Touch your throat: if it vibrates, it's /z/; if not, it's /s/.

phonemeTips.label: linking
phonemeTips.description: Connect words smoothly, no big gaps between them.
phonemeTips.hint_vi: Nối âm cuối từ trước với âm đầu từ sau, tránh ngắt quãng.
phonemeTips.hint_en: Link the ending sound of one word to the beginning of the next.

phonemeTips.label: word stress
phonemeTips.description: Make one syllable stronger, longer and higher.
phonemeTips.hint_vi: Nhấn 1 âm tiết: đọc to hơn, dài hơn, cao hơn.
phonemeTips.hint_en: Stress one syllable: say it louder, longer, and higher.

phonemeTips.label: sentence rhythm
phonemeTips.description: Strong beats on content words, weak on small words.
phonemeTips.hint_vi: Nhấn từ quan trọng, lướt nhanh từ nhỏ như a, the, to.
phonemeTips.hint_en: Stress main words (nouns, verbs) and reduce small words.

phonemeTips.label: rising intonation
phonemeTips.description: Raise your voice at the end of yes/no questions.
phonemeTips.hint_vi: Cuối câu hỏi Yes/No giọng đi lên.
phonemeTips.hint_en: Let your pitch go up at the end of the question.

phonemeTips.label: falling intonation
phonemeTips.description: Let your voice fall at the end of statements.
phonemeTips.hint_vi: Cuối câu kể giọng hạ xuống, nghe chắc chắn.
phonemeTips.hint_en: Drop your voice slightly at the end to sound certain.

phonemeTips.label: /tʃ/
phonemeTips.description: Air stops then releases like 't' + 'sh'.
phonemeTips.hint_vi: Âm kết hợp 't' + 'sh', bật hơi mạnh.
phonemeTips.hint_en: Stop the air then release with a 'ch' sound.

phonemeTips.label: /dʒ/
phonemeTips.description: Similar to /tʃ/ but voiced with vibration.
phonemeTips.hint_vi: Giống /tʃ/ nhưng có rung dây thanh.
phonemeTips.hint_en: Like /ch/ but with voice vibration.

phonemeTips.label: /i:/ vs /ɪ/
phonemeTips.description: Long /i:/ is longer and tenser than short /ɪ/.
phonemeTips.hint_vi: /i:/ kéo dài hơn, miệng căng hơn so với /ɪ/.
phonemeTips.hint_en: For /i:/ smile more and hold the sound longer.

phonemeTips.label: /æ/
phonemeTips.description: Open your mouth wide like in 'cat'.
phonemeTips.hint_vi: Há miệng rộng, lưỡi thấp.
phonemeTips.hint_en: Open your mouth wide and keep the tongue low.

phonemeTips.label: /əʊ/
phonemeTips.description: Start in the middle, then lips round at the end.
phonemeTips.hint_vi: Bắt đầu bình thường, cuối chu môi tròn.
phonemeTips.hint_en: Start relaxed, then round your lips at the end.

phonemeTips.label: confidence
phonemeTips.description: Use a clear, steady volume from start to end.
phonemeTips.hint_vi: Nói đủ to, rõ, không ngập ngừng.
phonemeTips.hint_en: Speak clearly, not too soft, and avoid mumbling.

phonemeTips.label: slow down
phonemeTips.description: Use 4 clear beats for short sentences.
phonemeTips.hint_vi: Chia câu thành 3–4 nhịp, dừng nhẹ từng nhịp.
phonemeTips.hint_en: Break the sentence into 3–4 beats and say each clearly.

turns.aiPrompt: Hi! What's your name?
turns.sampleStudent: My name is Linh.

turns.aiPrompt: Nice to meet you, Linh! How old are you?
turns.sampleStudent: I am twelve years old.

turns.aiPrompt: Great! Are you a student?
turns.sampleStudent: Yes, I am a student.

levels.goalSentence: Introduce your name, age and school.

turns.aiPrompt: Can you introduce yourself with your name and school?
turns.sampleStudent: My name is Linh and I study at BKAP School.
turns.targetPattern: My name is ... and I study at ...

turns.aiPrompt: Which class are you in?
turns.sampleStudent: I am in class 7A.

turns.aiPrompt: Nice! Say it again a bit more confident.
turns.sampleStudent: My name is Linh. I am twelve and I study at BKAP School.

levels.goalSentence: Introduce yourself with hobbies and reason.

turns.aiPrompt: Tell me your name and one hobby.
turns.sampleStudent: My name is Linh and I like reading books.
turns.targetPattern: My name is ... and I like ...

turns.aiPrompt: Great! Why do you like that hobby?
turns.sampleStudent: I like reading because it is relaxing.

turns.aiPrompt: Now say your full introduction in one go.
turns.sampleStudent: My name is Linh. I am twelve. I study at BKAP School and I like reading because it is relaxing.

turns.aiPrompt: Hi there! What would you like to drink?
turns.sampleStudent: I'd like an iced milk tea, please.

turns.aiPrompt: Great choice! Anything else?
turns.sampleStudent: No, thank you.

turns.aiPrompt: Perfect! Say it again a little slower.
turns.sampleStudent: I'd like an iced milk tea, please.

levels.goalSentence: Order a drink and a snack.

turns.aiPrompt: What would you like to drink and eat?
turns.sampleStudent: I'd like an iced tea and a sandwich, please.
turns.targetPattern: I'd like + drink + and + food, please.

turns.aiPrompt: Nice! Can you say it with good rhythm?
turns.sampleStudent: I'd LIKE an ICED tea and a SANDwich, PLEASE.

turns.aiPrompt: Excellent! One more time, naturally.
turns.sampleStudent: I'd like an iced tea and a sandwich, please.

levels.goalSentence: Order and change your mind politely.

turns.aiPrompt: Order a drink. Then change it politely.
turns.sampleStudent: I'd like a hot chocolate, please. Actually, can I have an orange juice instead?
turns.targetPattern: Order + actually, can I have ... instead?

turns.aiPrompt: Great! Focus on the /əʊ/ in 'no' and 'hotel'.
turns.sampleStudent: No, I'd like a cold orange juice.

turns.aiPrompt: Now say your final order smoothly.
turns.sampleStudent: I'd like a cold orange juice instead, please.

turns.aiPrompt: You are lost. Ask me where the school is.
turns.sampleStudent: Excuse me, where is the school?

turns.aiPrompt: Good! Now ask for the café.
turns.sampleStudent: Excuse me, where is the café?

turns.aiPrompt: Nice! Say it again, a bit slower.
turns.sampleStudent: Excuse me, where is the café?

turns.aiPrompt: Ask how to get to the bus station.
turns.sampleStudent: Excuse me, how can I get to the bus station?

turns.aiPrompt: Great! Repeat after me: 'Turn left and then go straight.'
turns.sampleStudent: Turn left and then go straight.
turns.targetPattern: Turn left and then go straight.

turns.aiPrompt: Now say the full conversation in one sentence.
turns.sampleStudent: Excuse me, how can I get to the bus station?

turns.aiPrompt: Ask if the bank is next to the café.
turns.sampleStudent: Is the bank next to the café?

turns.aiPrompt: Good! Now confirm the direction.
turns.sampleStudent: So I turn left and the bank is next to the café.

turns.aiPrompt: Say it again with strong rhythm on 'turn left' and 'next to the café'.
turns.sampleStudent: I TURN LEFT and the BANK is NEXT to the CAFÉ.

scenes.title: Shopping for Clothes
scenes.topic: sizes, price, I’d like…, how much…

turns.aiPrompt: Ask the price of this T-shirt.
turns.sampleStudent: Excuse me, how much is this T-shirt?

turns.aiPrompt: Great! Now ask for your size.
turns.sampleStudent: Do you have size M?

turns.aiPrompt: Say both sentences together.
turns.sampleStudent: Excuse me, how much is this T-shirt? Do you have size M?

turns.aiPrompt: Ask if you can try the jacket on.
turns.sampleStudent: Can I try this jacket on?

turns.aiPrompt: Say that it's too big.
turns.sampleStudent: It is too big for me.

turns.aiPrompt: Now ask for a smaller size politely.
turns.sampleStudent: Do you have a smaller size, please?
turns.targetPattern: Do you have a smaller size, please?

patterns: This one is ... but that one is ...

turns.aiPrompt: Compare two T-shirts: one cheap, one comfortable.
turns.sampleStudent: This one is cheaper, but that one is more comfortable.
turns.targetPattern: This one is ..., but that one is ...

turns.aiPrompt: Now decide which one you want.
turns.sampleStudent: I’ll take the more comfortable one.

turns.aiPrompt: Say your decision again with confidence.
turns.sampleStudent: I’ll take the more comfortable one, please.

turns.aiPrompt: How is the weather today?
turns.sampleStudent: It is sunny today.

turns.aiPrompt: Do you like this weather?
turns.sampleStudent: Yes, I like sunny weather.

turns.aiPrompt: Say it again, a little slower.
turns.sampleStudent: It is sunny today. I like sunny weather.

turns.aiPrompt: Give your friend a nice compliment.
turns.sampleStudent: I like your T-shirt.

turns.aiPrompt: Now add a polite phrase at the end.
turns.sampleStudent: I like your T-shirt, it looks cool.

turns.aiPrompt: Say it again with a friendly tone.
turns.sampleStudent: I like your T-shirt, it looks really cool.

levels.goalSentence: Start and continue a short small-talk.

turns.aiPrompt: Start with the weather and then ask your friend.
turns.sampleStudent: It is cold today. What about you, do you like cold weather?

turns.aiPrompt: Good! Repeat with better rhythm.
turns.sampleStudent: IT is COLD today. WHAT about YOU?

turns.aiPrompt: Now say it naturally and confidently.
turns.sampleStudent: It is cold today. What about you?
